attributes.action: require the Metropolitan Police to return all copies of documents relating to constituents of the Right Honourable Damian Green MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned constituents of the Right Honourable Damian Green MP (and others) petition the Prime Minister to strongly urge the Metropolitan Police to return all copies of documents relating to said constituents and to destroy any notes made regarding such documents.

The police action against Damian Green MP threatens not only privileged communications between Damian Green and his constituents it also threatens the liberty of the commons and, thereby, the security of every citizen of the United Kingdom.
